alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Jackson; Muscatine; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:16PM CDT until July 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ROCK ISLAND...WHITESIDE...NORTHWESTERN HENRY...CARROLL... SOUTHERN JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN CEDAR...SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN MUSCATINE AND CLINTON COUNTIES... At 915 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from South Sabula Lake Park to near Princeton Wildlife Area to Oak Grove, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Clinton, East Moline, Maquoketa, Morrison, Durant, Mount Carroll, Silvis, Geneseo, Eldridge, DeWitt, Milan, Colona, Camanche, Le Claire, Coal Valley and Savanna. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
